mapper.update:
CREATE TABLE ${_parameter} ( fid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, street_ TEXT, community_ TEXT, longitude_ double, latitude_ double,
origin_address TEXT, similar_address TEXT, standard_address TEXT,
status int, modifier TEXT, update_date Date, update_address TEXT, update_building_code TEXT )
mapper.insert: insert into ${sql_tablename} ( street_, community_, longitude_, latitude_, origin_address, similar_address, standard_address, status, modifier, update_date, update_address, update_building_code ) values ( #{street_}, #{community_}, #{longitude_}, #{latitude_}, #{origin_address}, #{similar_address}, #{standard_address}, #{status}, #{modifier}, #{update_date}, #{update_address}, #{update_building_code} )
